column6:
The bulk of the New Exiles have been off saving an,2008,9
alternate Earth, while their leader, Sabretooth, stayed behind. What has Apocalypse's former horseman been doing? His attention has turned to a threat that's been hovering on the periphery of the Exiles' awareness... Madame Hydra, Susan Storm, and her own band of reality-hopping associates! But can Sabretooth take on Sue's entire team on his own?
Rated A ...$2.99
